fields.title: Django Bug Report System
fields.description: A comprehensive bug tracking system built with Django. Allows users to report, track, and manage bugs with status updates and categorization.

fields.title: Facial Recognition System
fields.description: Advanced facial recognition system using OpenCV and Arcface for facial detection, feature extraction, and matching. Production-ready Django application.

fields.title: Admin Portal
fields.description: Full-featured admin dashboard for managing users, permissions, and system settings. Complete CRUD operations with role-based access control.

fields.title: To-Do App
fields.description: Simple yet powerful task management application. Create, update, delete, and organize your tasks with priority levels and due dates.

fields.title: Django Attendance System
fields.description: Automated attendance tracking system for educational institutions. Track attendance, generate reports, and manage student records efficiently.

fields.title: Django Authentication System
fields.description: Complete authentication and authorization system with email verification, password reset, and two-factor authentication. Production-ready solution.

fields.title: Contact Book App
fields.description: Feature-rich contact management application. Store, search, and manage contacts with advanced filtering and organization capabilities.

fields.title: Virtual Campus AI
fields.description: An intelligent AI assistant designed to help students in virtual learning environments. Simplifies complex tasks and provides real-time assistance.
fields.technologies: Python, AI, Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing

fields.title: Desktop AI Assistant
fields.description: Desktop automation AI assistant that automates routine tasks like file handling and opening tabs across Windows and Linux OS. Single-prompt operation.

fields.title: Beginner Dart Projects
fields.description: Collection of simple Dart coding tasks designed to build a strong foundation for Flutter app development. Perfect for beginners.

fields.title: Hello Flutter
fields.description: Flutter hello world application demonstrating the use of root widget, app bar widget, and text widget. Great starting point for Flutter beginners.

fields.title: Python Basics
fields.description: Beginner-friendly repository showcasing foundational Python programming concepts. Organized folders with practical mini-projects and simple scripts.

fields.title: Python Beginner Projects
fields.description: Collection of simple Python scripts for absolute beginners. Covers printing, conditionals, input handling, and simple logic perfect for classroom exercises.

fields.title: 21 Python Projects
fields.description: Collection of 21 beginner-to-intermediate Python projects and practice scripts. Covers games, utilities, and small apps for hands-on learning.
fields.technologies: Python, Games, Utilities, SQLite, File Handling, Mini-Apps

fields.title: Python Arrays
fields.description: Project displaying practical applications of arrays across different coding tasks. Learn array manipulation and usage patterns.

fields.title: C++ Projects
fields.description: Wide variety of beginner-friendly C++ projects. Covers math operations, control flow, OOP, and data structures like arrays, vectors, stacks, and queues.
fields.technologies: C++, OOP, Inheritance, Arrays, Vectors, Stacks, Queues, Algorithms

fields.title: Data Structures and Algorithms
fields.description: Beginner-friendly implementations of fundamental data structures and algorithms using C++. A practice ground for mastering core programming concepts.
fields.technologies: C++, Data Structures, Algorithms, Problem Solving, Fundamentals

fields.title: SmartBooks Web App
fields.description: Digital library web application for selling both e-books and physical books. PHP-based project with database and payment integration.
fields.technologies: PHP, MySQL, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, E-commerce

fields.title: Personal Portfolio Platform
fields.description: Tech-forward portfolio built with Django to showcase 19 projects, security credentials, and collaboration channels in one interactive experience.
